name: exam-server
description: Backend server for Exam Monitor v2.0

scripts.dev: npm run kill-servers && concurrently --names "EXAM,PRACTICE" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "node --watch server.mjs" "cd ../practice-server && npm start"
scripts.kill-servers: lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti:3030 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
